Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents disposal group including discontinued operations
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities
net cash provided by used in financing activities continuing operations
Other Financing Activities: proceeds from payments for other financing activities
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
proceeds from repayments of long term debt and capital securities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from other short term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
Repayment of Debt: repayments of other short term debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses and interest in affiliates
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
net cash provided by used in investing activities continuing operations
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from collection of finance receivables
proceeds from derivative instrument investing activities
proceeds from divestiture of businesses and interests in affiliates

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in contract with customer asset
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in customer financing assets
increase decrease in other operating assets
Deferred Income Taxes: increase decrease in deferred income taxes
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities
net cash provided by used in operating activities continuing operations
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
Other Non-Cash Items: disposal group not discontinued operation gain loss on disposal
domestic defined benefit plan stock contributions by employer
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
other operating activities cash flow statement
pension and other postretirement benefits expense reversal of expense noncash
pension expense reversal of expense noncash

__unmapped__: defined benefit plan contributions by employer
net cash provided by used in discontinued operations
payments for proceeds from businesses and interest in affiliates
payments for proceeds from derivative instrument investing activities
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
